concept.title: Rule 2
concept.shortdesc: In a series of three or more terms with a single conjunction, use a comma after each term except the last.

conbody.lines: red, white, and blue gold, silver, or copper He opened the letter, read it, and made a note of its contents.
conbody.p: This is also the usage of the Government Printing Office and of the Oxford University Press.
In the names of business firms the last comma is omitted, as,
